subject: Warranty issue
description_text:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I have a problem with my newly purchased Simsonn Pedals (see attachmend 
for receipt). The hydraulic rod from the throttle pedal lost it's 
pressure and the liquid is all over the board. Can you provide me with a 
spare? I've attached a video for clarification.

Thank you and dear regards!

Arndt-Xavier

Video: 
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/3fif3hk36d9nebyukbkl6/IMG_1170.MOV?rlkey=2fpiixdare7ckihz8e2scq68o&dl=0

conversations.body_text: Hi Arndt Küsel,  It’s possible that excessive dust caused the seal ring to get damaged. Please provide your contact name, phone number, and address, and we’ll send you a replacement throttle single-acting hydraulic rod.

Dear Sir or Madam,

thank you very much for your help, I will see what could have 
contributed to this problem. Thank you very much for your help with the 
spare part. Here are the contact details:

Arndt Equiano
Dresdener Strasse 10
59269 Beckum

Phone: +491744058080

Dear regards,

Equiano


Am 11.11.25 um 15:25 schrieb service@simsonn.com:
> Hi Arndt Küsel,
>
> It’s possible that excessive dust caused the seal ring to get damaged. 
> Please provide your contact name, phone number, and address, and we’ll 
> send you a replacement throttle single-acting hydraulic rod.
>
>

Hi Arndt Küsel,  Here is the tracking number : YT2532800711914396. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/
